{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$212.9K in 2021-2022** on contracts with IMP GROUP.

Across 22 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 7 have at least one amendment (32%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 99% and the average number of amendments was 3.29. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$2.0M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 2.03 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$680.8K. The longest contract was 6.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$2.7M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
